mapper.select: select count(*) from ${prefix}shop_user_role user_role left join ${prefix}shop_user user on user_role.shop_user_id = user.shop_user_id where user_role.role_id = ${roleId} and user.is_delete = 0

select role.role_id as roleId, role.role_name as roleName from ${prefix}shop_user_role user_role left join ${prefix}shop_role role on user_role.role_id = role.role_id where user_role.shop_user_id = ${shopUserId}
